questions: Who is the head and secretary of Industrial Engineering Department?
Who is the head and secretary of IE Deparment?
Who is the IE Deparment head and secretary?
answers: Engr. Alein Navares and Engr. Aries Rivero
The head and secretary of Industrial Engineering Deparment is Engr. Alein Navares and Engr. Aries Rivero.
IE Deparment head and secretary is Engr. Alein Navares and Engr. Aries Rivero.
